bboxes.reason: Bounding box 5 encompasses the rinse button area, including the pressing area and the label, as required for selection according to the button selection criteria.

The bounding box with index 1 accurately highlights the area of the digital display, labeled as 'Time left', which is the element to be identified. It correctly encloses its full region without ambiguity.
The bounding box with index 9 encompasses both the label text 'Wash' and the button symbol, accurately identifying the wash_button as described in the criteria.

Bounding box 3 correctly encompasses the executable button labeled 'Program,' including part of the pressing area. Bounding box 11 only focuses on the label text and excludes the button area, making it invalid per the selection criteria.
The bounding box with index 4 primarily encircles the button area with the icon for the 'Spin' function, which includes the interactive execution region.

The delay_timer_button is an executable button, and bounding box 6 captures the actual button area with the clock icon, which is the interactive region for the 'Delay Timer' function. Bounding box 30 focuses only on the label, which is not the interaction area.

Bounding box 7 captures the pressing area of the power button, which is an interactive region. Bounding box 18 only encompasses the label text 'Power On/Off' and does not cover the physical button itself.
The 'Water Level' button is a soft pad with both an icon and a label. Bounding box 8 circumscribes the actionable soft pad area (icon and label together), making it the best fit as per the criteria.
Bounding box 10 captures the physical button of the Start/Pause element, labeled with the play/pause icon. This is an executable region.
